snippet: Ronald D. Liebowitz, who has greatly expanded the reach of Middlebury College, will step down in 2015, after 11 years as president, he said Thursday.
abstract: Ronald D Liebowitz will step down following 11 years as president of Middlebury College, having greatly expanded Vermont institution's reach.
lead_paragraph: Ronald D. Liebowitz, who has greatly expanded the reach of Middlebury College, will step down in 2015, after 11 years as president, he said Thursday.

headline.main: President of Middlebury College Says He Will Leave
headline.print_headline: Vermont: Middlebury President to Step Down
